mentions.candidate: Chris has stood for the Green Party in many local and national elections; he has been a school governor and a parish councillor.

leaflet.personalStatement: Chris trained as an engineer at the Royal Aircraft Establishment in Farnborough and has a can-do attitude. He has been self-employed most of his life working as a potter, computer engineer, drummer and with people who have special needs.

images.caption: Chris Southall holding a solar panel with greenery in the background.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Printed on 100% recycled paper by Hillingdon Greenprint Ltd, 58 Beech Avenue, Ruislip, HA4 8UQ
